column6: "DAY OF THE ATOM" PART 3 (OF 4) The shocking return of an enemy thought dead rocks the X-Men to their very core! Can they overcome an adversary more powerful than they imagined, or will internal strife within the team itself tear them apart first?
column8: | writer:Chuck Austen | writer:Stan Lee | colorist:Udon Comics | penciller (cover):Salvador Larroca | inker:Danny K. Miki
